member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.PageNo
member.summary:
current page number.
default: 1
example: p=1

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.PageSize
member.summary:
how many items to get from db per page per request
default: 10
example: pageSize=10

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.TotalRecords
member.summary:
Total count of records in the db
default: 0

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.MaxDisplayedPages
member.summary:
if count of pages is too much, restrict shown pages count to specific number
default: 10

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.GapSize
member.summary:
Gap size to start show first/last numbered page
default: 3

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.SettingsJson
member.summary: name of the settings section in appSettings.json default: "default"

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.PageSizeNavBlockSize
member.summary: This property is deprected. Use PageSizeDropdownItems instead

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.PageSizeNavMaxItems
member.summary: This property is deprected. Use PageSizeDropdownItems instead

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.PageSizeDropdownItems
member.summary: A list of dash delimitted numbers for page size dropdown. default: "10-25-50"

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.PageSizeNavOnChange
member.summary:
action to take when page size dropdown changes
default: this.form.submit();

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.QueryStringKeyPageNo
member.summary:
Query string paramter name for current page.
default: p
exmaple: p=1

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.QueryStringKeyPageSize
member.summary:
Query string parameter name for page size
default: s
example: s=25

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.QueryStringValue
member.summary: query-string-value is obsolte and will be removed in a future release.

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.ShowPageSizeNav
member.summary:
Show drop down list for different page size options
default: true
options: true, false

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.ShowFirstLast
member.summary:
Show/hide First-Last buttons
default: true, if set to false and total pages > max displayed pages it will be true

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.ShowPrevNext
member.summary:
Show/hide Previous-Next buttons
default: true

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.ShowTotalPages
member.summary:
Show or hide total pages count
default: true

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.ShowTotalRecords
member.summary:
Show or hide total records count
default: true

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.ShowLastNumberedPage
member.summary:
Show last numbered page when total pages count is larger than max displayed pages
default: true

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.ShowFirstNumberedPage
member.summary:
Show first numbered page when total pages count is larger than max displayed pages
default: true

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.TextPageSize
member.summary:
The text to display at page size dropdown list label
default: Page size

Text to show on the "Go To First" Page button
default: «

member.summary:
Text to show on "Go to last page" button
default: »

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.TextNext
member.summary:
Next button text
default: ›

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.TextPrevious
member.summary:
previous button text
default: ‹

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.PagingTagHelper.TextTotalPages

Display text for total pages label

Display text for total records label

member.summary: The JavaScript function to call if the page update fails.

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.Properties.Resources.LocalizationValidationScripts_jsdeliver
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <!-- cldr scripts (needed for globalize) --> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rxaviers/cldrjs@0.5.1/dist/cldr.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rxaviers/cldrjs@0.5.1/dist/cldr/event.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/rxaviers/cldrjs@0.5.1/dist/cldr/supplemental.js"></script>
<!-- globalize scripts --> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/globalizejs/globalize@1.4.2/dist/globalize.js"></script> <script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/globalizejs/g [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: P:LazZiya.TagHelpers.Properties.Resources.LocalizationValidationScripts_local
member.summary:
Looks up a localized string similar to <!-- cldr scripts (needed for globalize) --> <script src="/lib/cldr/dist/cldr.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/cldr/dist/cldr/event.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/cldr/dist/cldr/supplemental.min.js"></script>
<!-- globalize scripts --> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize/number.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize/date.min.js"></script> <script src="/lib/globalize/dist/globalize/currency.min.js"></s [rest of string was truncated]";.

members.member:
